title: RD - Schizophrenic DOJ Behavior, Baldwin Update & Rittenhouse Preview
itunes:title: RD - Schizophrenic DOJ Behavior, Baldwin Update & Rittenhouse Preview
description:
Adam and Mark open the show discussing an article Mark saw suggesting that ERs are full again, but not for the reason you'd think. They also discuss the events of January 6th from a variety of angles before giving an update on the developments out New Mexico from the set of Alec Baldwin's 'Rust'.  As the show wraps up they look ahead to the impending trial of Kyle Rittenhouse and what's to come on that front. 

Watch this episode & subscribe on YouTube at YouTube.com/AdamCarolla
